The boline is the second cerimonial blade, along with the $(l:tools/athame)Athame$().
It is used for gathering and was born as an instrument.$(br2)In the practice, it represents

the produce, and the act of cutting, which is what this item excels at: most natural plants can be harvested with it without being damaged, as you would with normal shears.$(2br)There are a few unique uses for this item where shears just won't work, such as getting between the leaves and the attached piece of a $(l:exploration/beehive)beehive$(), to get the combs without damaging them.$(2br)The boline can also be placed
on top of an altar to transfer its harvesting properties and

$(thing)$(t:by a small amount, a few blocks)expand the area from which it gathers its power$().$(2br)Finally, a boline can also be used to collect a small sample of a particular $(t:biome)environment$(), by right clicking with it while standing in that particular place.
